Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Lf-CATH2 (L. fragilis cathelicidin 2; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: fragile large-headed frog, fragile wart frog,Limnonectes fragilis, Hainan, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: 56.3% similar toCathelicidin-PY.Antimicrobial activity: Active against Gram-positive S. aureus ATCC2592, IS 1303, IS 1349 (MIC 2.27-9.08 uM), S.aureus IS 1307, IS 1348, S. epidermidis (MIC 4.54 uM), P. acnes ATCC11827 (MIC 18.2 uM),  Gram-negative P. aeruginosa IS 1411, IS 1412, IS 1413 (MIC 4.54-9.08 uM), E. coli ATCC25922, IS 1334, IS 1335, IS 1342 (MIC 2.27-9.08 uM), K.pneumoniae IS 1368 (ND), P.vulgaris (ND at 2 mg/ml), fungi C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 1.13 uM), and C. glabrata IS0902 (MIC 4.54 uM). Updated 5/2019; 7/2021; 11/2023
Literature Information.Author: Yu H, Cai S, Gao J, Zhang S, Lu Y, Qiao X, Yang H, Wang Y.2013
Literature Information.Title: Identification and polymorphism discovery of the cathelicidins, Lf-CATHs in ranid amphibian (Limnonectes fragilis).
